name: LlamaPolicyMetadataParamRegistry

Result.description:
LlamaExecutor.execute(address,uint256,bool,bytes).target (foo.sol#29) lacks a zero-check on :
		- (success,result) = target.delegatecall(data) (foo.sol#34)
		- (success,result) = target.call{value: value}(data) (foo.sol#34)
Result.markdown:
[LlamaExecutor.execute(address,uint256,bool,bytes).target](foo.sol#L29) lacks a zero-check on :
